text_block_list.text:
An event sponsored by Tracen Academy 
has opened at Tokyo Racecourse today.

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text:
— The mini-live is going to start soon! 
— Who's in the next race? 
— That last race was crazy～!

The turnout today gave the event a 
festival-like feel that didn't pale in 
comparison to any other race day.
choice_data_list: The racers seem pretty nervous too.
The racers seem pretty nervous too.

text_block_list.name: Festive Uma
text_block_list.text:
H-Hey! Is the ribbon on the back 
of my outfit crooked?

text_block_list.name: Level-headed Uma
text_block_list.text:
I said you're good! More importantly, 
make sure you're properly stretching～

text_block_list.name: Senpai Loving Uma
text_block_list.text:
Senpai! I've finished warming up! 
What's next!?

text_block_list.name: Kouhai Loving Uma
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, good job. 
Next, let's take some deep breaths, shall we?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (I really… should've brought earplugs.)

text_block_list.name: Racecourse Staff
text_block_list.text:
—— It'll soon be time to enter the race. 
If everyone can please head over…

text_block_list.name: Uma Friends
text_block_list.text:
— Ah～ I'm so nervous! Hey～ if I lose, 
will you comfort me? 
— Yeah, yeah. We'll go to the usual store～

text_block_list.name: Kouhai and Senpai
text_block_list.text: — Uuuuu～ Shenbai… — It'll be alright. Just make sure you reach the finish line safely.

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: …Tch.

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text: Um, are you alright?

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: …Why wouldn't I be?

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text:
Nothing at all. I just saw you were alone 
and was wondering if I could help you 
with anything ——

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: —— I'm fine.

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: I require… no assistance.

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Everyone has entered their gates! 
I wonder what type of race we'll see this time!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (—— Yeah, I don't need it.)

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
All the runners have started! They all had 
a perfect start and are forming a line!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text:
(Such half-hearted things… 
are only obstacles.)

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (I don't need it.)

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (I don't need them.)

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (—— It's unnecessary!)

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! We have Admire Groove! 
Admire Groove is starting her attack!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (Since I'm alone… I'm strong! I'm faster!)

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: I won't… lose!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It's Admire Groove, Admire Groove! 
You wouldn't think this is an event race 
with this amazing running we're seeing!

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah… ………

text_block_list.name: Admire Groove
text_block_list.text: (…There, do they understand now?)

Admire Groove left the turf with grace. 
Her back was beautiful… but it was also 
solitary and chilling.
